title: Former PM Mahinda arrives in Parliament
body_lines: Former Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has arrived in the Parliament to attend today’s proceedings.
This is the first time Rajapaksa made an appearance in the House after resigning as the Prime Minister of Sri Lanka on the 9th of May.
His resignation came hours after the supporters of the ruling party attacked the anti-government protesters outside the Temple Trees and at the Galle Face Green in Colombo.
